context.p: To register the Oxygen WebHelp plugin for the DocBook XSL distribution, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Create a .txt file named license in the com.oxygenxml.webhelp subdirectory of the DocBook XSL directory.
In this file, copy the Oxygen Scripting license key, which you purchased for your Oxygen WebHelp plugin.
step.info: The WebHelp transformation process reads the Oxygen license key from this file. In case the file does not exit, or it contains an invalid license, an error message will be displayed.
